title: Hands-on with the Honor Magic V: Honorâ€™s first foldable phone
content:
Honor unveiled the Honor Magic V at a Chinese launch event in January 2022, its first foray into the foldable smartphone market. It’s a Chinese exclusive with no international launch date in sight, but it packs high-end specifications in one folding package. It’s a similar form-factor to the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3, though slightly

The post Hands-on with the Honor Magic V: Honor’s first foldable phone appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Honor Magic V is Honor's first foldable smartphone, and we got some hands-on time at this year's Mobile World Congress. Check it out!
